mapper.update: update REAGENT_KIT set GENE_TYPE = #{geneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALIAS = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAGENT_KIT_DESC = #{reagentKitDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORD = #{ord,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GENE_TYPE, CODE, NAME, ALIAS, REAGENT_KIT_DESC, ORD, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME from REAGENT_KIT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GENE_TYPE, CODE, NAME, ALIAS, REAGENT_KIT_DESC, ORD, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME from REAGENT_KIT
select ID,NAME from REAGENT_KIT WHERE GENE_TYPE = '1' ORDER BY ORD
